Bleeding is a Status Effect in Baldur's Gate 3. Status Effects are the different conditions that can affect characters in both positive and negative ways.

Bleeding Information

Effect: Takes 2 Slashing damage at the start of each turn and has Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws. Removed by healing.

How to Inflict Bleeding

Lacerate (Weapon Action) Spiked Bulb Slicing Shortsword Duellist's Prerogative Amulet of Bhaal Find Familiar: Crab (Pinch attack) Helldusk Gloves Wildheart Barbarian: Tiger's Bloodlust ??

How to Remove Bleeding

Use of any healing potion or spell will remove the Bleeding condition.

Bleeding Notes & Tips

See BOOOAL's Benediction, Aspect of the Beast: Tiger, and Aspect of the Beast: Wolverine for synergies with Bleeding. Notes and tips go here.
